featured.text: When the donkey jumped into the stream and got the sacks wet, they became much ___(39)___.
The next day, Amir loaded the sacks ___(38)___ with salt but with sand.

definition.zh_def: 一種通常由布或紙製成的袋子，用於裝載物品或運輸。
definition.en_def: A bag made of cloth or paper, used for carrying or storing items.
definition.example: She packed her groceries in a reusable sack.
